comments.body: Can you add a test with v6 addresses?

assert already gives a pretty readable message (which is why I generally prefer this package)

```
--- FAIL: TestSourceIPs (0.00s)
    --- FAIL: TestSourceIPs/redundant_Real-Ip_with_forwarded-for (0.00s)
        http_test.go:598: 
            	Error Trace:	http_test.go:598
            	Error:      	Not equal: 
            	            	expected: []string{"120.120.120.126", "2.2.2.2.5", "4.5.6.7", "1.2.3.4"}
            	            	actual  : []string{"120.120.120.126", "2.2.2.2", "4.5.6.7", "1.2.3.4"}
            	            	
            	            	Diff:
            	            	--- Expected
            	            	+++ Actual
            	            	@@ -2,3 +2,3 @@
            	            	  (string) (len=15) "120.120.120.126",
            	            	- (string) (len=9) "2.2.2.2.5",
            	            	+ (string) (len=7) "2.2.2.2",
            	            	  (string) (len=7) "4.5.6.7",
            	Test:       	TestSourceIPs/redundant_Real-Ip_with_forwarded-for
```
